response.original_title: 女闇金ユリ~恥辱に悶える夜の花園~
response.overview: Yuri, who was abandoned by her parents who were in debt, is saved by Saejima, who was collecting loan shark debts. A few years later, the two meet again and form a bond, but Saejima is murdered by someone. Yuri takes over from him and starts a loan shark company for women, but she uses underhanded methods and sexual allure to extort money from them...
response.title: Female Loan Shark Yuri: A Garden of Nights Writhing in Shame

titles.title: On'na yamikin yuri ~ chijoku ni modaeru yoru no Hanazono ~
